name: Kafka Replicator Source
shortDescription: Replicate data from a Kafka topic to a Quix Cloud topic

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: This is the Quix Topic that will receive the replicated data

Variables.Name: SOURCE_BROKER_ADDRESS
Variables.Description: The source Kafka broker address (e.g., localhost:9092 or broker.example.com:9092)

Variables.Name: SOURCE_TOPIC
Variables.Description: The source Kafka topic name to replicate from

Variables.Name: AUTO_OFFSET_RESET
Variables.Description: What to do when there is no initial offset in Kafka. Options: earliest, latest

Variables.Name: VALUE_DESERIALIZER
Variables.Description: Deserializer to use for the message value. Options: json, bytes, string, double, integer

Variables.Name: KEY_DESERIALIZER
Variables.Description: Deserializer to use for the message key. Options: json, bytes, string, double, integer

Variables.Name: SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: Timeout for shutting down the source in seconds

Variables.Name: SOURCE_KAFKA_SASL_USERNAME
Variables.Description: SASL username for source Kafka authentication (optional)

Variables.Name: SOURCE_KAFKA_SASL_PASSWORD
Variables.Description: SASL password for source Kafka authentication (optional)

Variables.Name: SOURCE_KAFKA_SASL_MECHANISM
Variables.Description: SASL mechanism for authentication. Options: PLAIN, SCRAM-SHA-256, SCRAM-SHA-512, GSSAPI, OAUTHBEARER, AWS_MSK_IAM

Variables.Name: SOURCE_KAFKA_SSL_CA_LOCATION
Variables.Description: Path to the SSL CA certificate file for secure connections. If not provided, system default CA certificates will be used
